name: Wake Up (itch) (Glacebon, leokrechmer, Laura Mustonen, neoaarni, Exoplants)
name_original: Wake Up (itch) (Glacebon, leokrechmer, Laura Mustonen, neoaarni, Exoplants)
description:
Do your memories haunt you? You can't live a life without making mistakes. Will you learn from them? Face your inner demons in a short but compelling visual novel. Do you have what it takes to Wake Up?

Visual novel game project done for Pride Game Jam 2021 held online 2.7.2021-4.7.2021 using Ren'Py engine.
